title: Gemma O’Brien Teaches You Block Lettering Techniques | Volcom | School Of Cool
description:
Welcome to the first episode of Volcom School Of Cool hand lettering tutorials from Volcom Ambassador, Gemma O’Brien.

This lesson is a bold block letter form tutorial where you will learn how to give your lettering dimension and adding strong color.

asset.title: Gemma O’Brien Teaches You Block Lettering Techniques | Volcom | School Of Cool
asset.description:
Welcome to the first episode of Volcom School Of Cool hand lettering tutorials from Volcom Ambassador, Gemma O’Brien (aka @mrseaves101 on Instagram).

This lesson is a bold block letter form tutorial where you will learn how to give your lettering dimension and adding strong color.

Grab a free download of Gemma's alphabet guide template as well as a list of all the supplies you need to follow along with Gemma at the link below.

http://www.volcom.com.au/news/school-of-cool-gemma-obrien-rad-tutorial/

Have a go and make sure you Instagram your creation, tag @volcomwomens_oz and #volcomschoolofcool and Gemma will pick her favorite to win the original signed artwork created by her in this tutorial!
asset.author: Volcom

transcripts: So for this alphabet we're working with a bold kind of Tuscan style of lettering. It's called Tuscan because you've got these kind of spurred feet at the end of the letter form. It's kind of more of a bold blocky version than more con Tuscan have bold shapes. So I'm going to take this blank alphabet build out a bit of dimension and then add some color. I'm going to write the word rad. So this is the rad piece finished off. We started with our structural outline a little bit of dimension and then used the color to kind of give it a two tone shadow with the finishing up from the dots. All done.
